'''Provender Proliferating Organism''' is a special enemy encountered during Phase 2 of the [[Guardian of Apep's Oasis]] Weekly Boss.

==Stats==
{{Enemy Stats|dendro_res=50%|res2=While Buffing|resglobal2=9910%|dendro_res2=9950%|hp_ratio=3.2|hp_type=2|hide_atk=1|hide_notes=1}}

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Provender Proliferating Organism

|name_1      = Buff
|desc_1      = Buffs up to 3 nearby Preliminary Proliferating Organisms. While buffing, it will gain '''9900%''' [[RES]] to all damage types and high [[Interruption Resistance]]. If a buffed Preliminary Proliferating Organism is defeated, it will lose 40% of its Max [[HP]].
}}
